Articles.Content:
Well, biggish

Javascript is disabled. View full album

1, 2 & 3 control the jets. 1 for the turbojets.

Hit 0 halfway down the runway to raise the rear wheels so you can angle up.

Cruises at about 25K on just the turbos.

Not sure what it's actually for though.

The fuel drains asymetrically, sadly, and I can't fix it but the whole damn thing is so big it doesn't actually seem to matter too much.
